pricing_psychology.value_stacking: Don't discount—add value instead. Throw in closet, garage, or accent wall rather than cutting price

pricing_psychology.color_consultation: Offer 'free' $200 color consultation (build into price)—customers perceive huge added value
pricing_psychology.square_footage_trap: Avoid pure $/sq ft pricing—charge for complexity, prep work, trim detail. Educate customers why simple math doesn't work.
